data.title: Imposter Dragon!
data.statement:
There are a group of dragons, but there is one fake dragon among them! To find this imposter, the dragons decided to do a roaring contest, since the fake dragon can not do the ferocious dragon roar. The fake dragon will try to mimic the roar, but he can only do so very quietly. <<Find out which roar is the quietest(with the least capital letters)>>, and return the line(starting at 0) in which the roar was given in from the input!

P.S. There will always be a roar with the least capital letters, and it won't be tied with another roar.

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn:
7
ARRRARRAraraARRARRRRAAAAaaA
RRAARrarARaaarA
Arrrarraa
ARARRRARARAAARRARAAAA
aRRRaaraarrrarARaaraAAA
ArarrrrrraAARaara
arrrARARAaaaaarARARARAR

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read roar:string(300)

write imposter among dragons!
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: An integer [[N]] of how many roars will be given
<<Next [[N]] lines>>: A string [[roar]]
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1>>: The line(0 based) of the imposter dragon's roar from the given inputs

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

There are a group of dragons, but there is one fake dragon among them! To find this imposter, the dragons decided to do a roaring contest, since the fake dragon can not do the ferocious dragon roar. The fake dragon will try to mimic the roar, but he can only do so very quietly. Find out which roar is the quietest(with the least capital letters), and return the line(starting at 0) in which the roar was given in from the input!

P.S. There will always be a roar with the least capital letters, and it won't be tied with another roar.
Input
Line 1: An integer N of how many roars will be given
Next N lines: A string roar
Output
Line 1: The line(0 based) of the imposter dragon's roar from the given inputs
Constraints
50 >= N >= 2
300 >= roar's length >= 2
Example
Input
7
ARRRARRAraraARRARRRRAAAAaaA
RRAARrarARaaarA
Arrrarraa
ARARRRARARAAARRARAAAA
aRRRaaraarrrarARaaraAAA
ArarrrrrraAARaara
arrrARARAaaaaarARARARAR
Output
2
